name: Stan (Morfy)
description:
Premise

You play as the dog of a blind man. Help him orientate through the wasteland and make sure he doesn't die.

Credits

Game by Morfy

Music by Blind Willie Johnson

Sounds from Freesound.org and YouTube Audio Library

Font from dafont

Controls

Arrow keys to move

E to bark

Bark once to command movement

Bark twice to command an attack. Attack will be aimed towards you (the dog).

F11 to toggle fullscreen
